24107.name: Behind the Fall of Magma
description: It is extremely humid in here.  It seems that much heat and moisture is
captured behind the magma here.  You can't see much, except for the numerous
markings that symbolize {1Fire{0.  To the west you hear something.  Most
likely this same 'thing' you've been seeing lurking around the pool of
magma.

24215.name: In the Air
description: Clear skies, no clouds, no civilization, no living things.  The peace you
find in the air here is one you have never met before.  It's just you, the
{#sun{0 and the cool gentle {6breeze{0 that relieves you of any overly
amounts of warmth you might feel.

24240.name: Oyster Room
description: What a strange room....  In the center of the room, and taking up
the majority of it, lies a huge pile of oysters..  Just stacked
there...  The oysters seemd to be placed neatly ontop of one another
and seem like they are well tended to.  But by what?  The you notice a
small claw, and then a whole...  Crab?  Yes, and its tending to the
oysters...  These are the keepers of the Oysters?!?

24115.name: In a Magical Pool of Water
description: The water here is warm and {&clear{0.  You feel at peace with the water
and find oddly enough that you are not at loss of breath yet.  Looking
around you see nothing but water and the occasional schools of fishes here
and there.

24186.name: Marble Center
description: You stand in an empty marble room, that pretty much takes up the whole
base of the tower.  The walls and floors are all made out of smooth marble.
Just to the ahead of you is a spiraling stairway leading up to the next
floor.  The stairs are also made of smooth marble, along with gold trim
outlining their figure.

24087.name: End of the Fun!
description: SCREEEEEEEECCCCHHHHH!
You dive out of your ore cart as fast as you can because it just went head on with a fire drake in molten lava! Oh man...that Drake is pissed!

24183.name: Sylvan Forest
description: After coming out of the locked door to the south, the cave opened up to a
prosperous forest which stands before you now.  The {#sun{0 shines brightly
in the clear blue sky.  Songbirds fill the area with calm and relaxing
music.  And critters of all sorts, chipmunks, rabbits, squirrels, can be
seen running along with their daily chores.  To the north, you can make out
a small trail.  By the looks of how it is overgrown, brings you to believe
that this trail has not been used by many in the past years.

the east and west passages make sharp turns up ahead.  To the north, there

24211.name: Lair of the Ancient Air Elemental

description: You are walking within the Halls of {1Fire{0. All the surrounding walls are painted in with a very detailed and realistic look of flames engulfing the entire area.

24083.name: On the Tracks
description: You decide to take a little adventure, knowing very well that the tracks
could be broken ahead and lead you to a plunging death into a bath of molten
lava where your flesh would melt and your eyeballs turn into mush...  But
anyway!  You feel lucky!  So you hop on into the ore cart, which is the only
access to enter the hole, and tuck yourself inside after you give it a
little push.

24007.name: Damp Passageway
description: The air is extremely damp here, and puddles have formed on the floor from
all the excess water dripping from the parts of the cave.  To the east is a
large door, with old carvings which are now too old and faded to make
anything of.  The damp passageway continues on north from here.

24094.name: Unworked Vein of Precious Metal
description: This area contains in its walls an unmistakable vein of precious
metals...  Something that many prospecting groups would love to get a hold
of.  The walls continue to flicker from a strange glowing light source
nearby north.

24165.name: 1500 ft Underwater
description: You descend deeper down into the {6cold {$blue{0 waters.  This place

is the only thing you see everywhere - no fishes, no stone markings, no
plants..  Nothing.

Down doesn't look any better. The next time you have an incident like that, it may be your last.

description: You have entered what seems to be a once inhabited home of some large

came.

description: Whew!  This room is full of dust and cobwebs!  Dust tickles your nose and

24001.name: Just inside the Cave
description: As you enter the cavern, the feeling of power become stronger and you can
almost make out textures or patterns in the air that are slowly becoming
misty.  Glancing around as the mist thickens you quickly make out four
symbols - Earth, Air , Fire, and Water - and the mist then encompasses your
sight.  A faint glowing light can be seen from what appears to be north to
you, and to your back, south, is the exit out into the woods again.

24202.name: Lair of Teilmon, Dragon of Spirit
description: You have entered a large domed room, big enough to fit a whole tower!  In
fact, something kinda occupies that much space anyhow....  Teilmon.  *gulp*

24052.name: Lair of Ancient Water Elemental
description: You have entered the chambers of the Ancient {$Wat{6er {^Ele{6men{$tal{0.
The walls of this room are made of water and magically held in place to form
the shape of square room.  A tingling sensation runs down your spine as you
enter this room.  You feel like you are being tested.

description: The water has shifted from clear to a {6light blue{0 color.  The fish
population is abundant here and you see randomn plants attached to rocks
every now and then.  The water is now slightly chilly compared to the
comfortable warm waters above you.  Oddly enough, you still do not feel the
need to get oxygen.

description: Water sprays and hits your whole body as you enter this place!  Before

crumbled as a waterfall spashes out of all three directions!  The water
collects in the center of the room into a small pool of water that goes
quite deep.  You notice a doorway to the north behind the waterfall , and a

description: A well kept ore cart is here lined up with the rail tracks and still
quite useable.  Looking westward you see that the cave closes in and the

track that leads west stays level with your sight for a few feet and then

that flows just beside you is giving off a tremendous amount of heat and you
feel your stamina giving in.  The rocky path continues on down, still quite
close to the magma

24004.name: Stalagmites and Stalactites
description: The ceiling and floor here is growing with numerous stalactites and
stalagmites that have probably been forming for many decades.  An occasional
drip echoes the cavern here as some calcium liquid drips from the
stalactites above.  A narrow staircase has been carved into the rock of the
west wall leading upward.

24003.name: Small Naturally Made Room
description: You make your way past the mist as a cool wave of air overcomes you.
Looking around you see the coarse and jagged stone of the natural made
cavern floor starting to protrude small stalagmites and the ceiling as well
with stalactites.  To the east and west, two large wooden doors, cracked and
settled with age, hold tight to their poorly made frames.  To the North the
cave continues, and South is back to the mist

24164.name: 1000 ft Underwater
description: You push yourself to plunge deeper into the depths of the waters and
realize that you are VERY far below.  The waters have become extremely cold
and your lungs start to hurt a little from the surrounding pressure.

24079.name: Bottom of the Fissure
description: Fog encompasses you now..  Or is it hot steam...  A blast of hot air
shoots from a hole in the earth and burns your leg!  Eerie whistling and
strange sounds envelop your mind.
A huge hole that looks like it was dug by some monstrous being can be seen to the north

24073.name: Along the Railtrack
description: The walls here have been chisled and hacked at for thier precious stone
and now look quite bare.  Also, oddly enough, you light doesn't seem to be
shing as bright as you continue further.

24109.name: Lair of the Ancient Fire Elemental
description: The walls and floors of this room are on fire!  Lucky for you, its a
magical fire, and does not catch to your clothing, but still, none the less,
it sure is hot!  Standing in the center of the room, being one with the
engulfing flames, lies the {1Fire{0 Elemental...

24063.name: Bottom of Pit
description: Whee!!  Down you go into the depths of the pit, falling endlessly
when suddenly...  ****POOM!**** you fall right into a pile of soot that
most likely saved your life!

24018.name: Entrance to the {3Realm {$of {6Water{0
description: Upon the floor here depicts the symbol of water, encompassig the whole
floor.  The door leading into this realm is not locked oddly enough.  You
also seem to lack in concentration in this room, and you mind becomes too
befuddled for any sort of spell.

turn blue.  There are no plants to be seen at this depth for the cold is too

stones that probably equal out to the sizes of houses in the above world.
Hmm, well there is one thing you notice shining in the corner under one of
those stones...  It's a giant Mollusk!

The Inscription on the door reads: {3Follow the Current to the goal...  {0
An inscription of clam adorns the door here along with a some text saying

This room is basically bare. A few remains of bones can be seen from what the umber hulk might of had for it's last dinner.

description: The door to the west opens up to a huge room which lies before you.
Starting from where you stand, pillars line the walls but come to a dead end

your step...

24005.name: Curving Hallway
description: As you enter this part of the cavern, a very wet, and damp feeling

24055.name: Entrance to the {3Realm {$of {!Fire{0
description: The symbol of Fire encompasses the whole floor here, givng off vast

24112.name: In a Magical Pool of Water
description: You are swimming on the surface of great pool of water that seems to go
endlessly down.  The water here is crystal clear and and quite warm.  It

24160.name: Deep Underwater
description: The water has shifted from clear to a {6light blue{0 color.  The fish

every now and then.  The water is now slightly chilly compared to the
comfortable warm waters above you.  Oddly enough, you still do not feel the
need to get oxygen.

24022.name: Along a thin ledge of Stone
description: You are now walking along a VERY narrow ledge of stone.  One false step
might lead you into the whirlpools below....  Which don't look to pleasant
to be in really.  Don't sneeze, try not to breath heavy, and you'll be just
fine...  To the north and south you can see the whirlpools twisting and
turning with a very strong current...  But to the north you see something
shining, like an object sticking out of the water.  To your east is a door
and west is back to the pillars

24204.name: In the Air
description: Clear skies, no clouds, no civilization, no living things.  The peace you
find in the air here is one you have never met before.  It's just you, the
{#sun{0 and the cool gentle {6breeze{0 that relieves you of any overly
amounts of warmth you might feel.

description: You come to the end of the bridge and to solid ground.  You are away from
the violent sputtering lava that surrounded the bridge.  Up ahead is an
entryway to a different type of cavern with some arcane writings.

24088.name: Sanctuary
description: A bright light envelops the room here and makes you squint your eyes from
its intensity.  A uplifting feeling overcomes you and you know that up above
must be really nice.  In fact, you somehow know that if you decided to, you
could actualy float up there.

24201.name: Final Door
description: A great swarming power engulfs your being, and you canse sense it so
disturbing that you magic cannot be concentrated enough.  Taking a look upon
the door before you, a voice whispers "{8The Final Door{1....  {3The Final
Test{1.  {0"

24080.name: Through the Hole
description: The dug out hole continues north. A faint light can be seen from that direction, not to mention the groud is quivering as you get closer

24012.name: Bright Light
description: Upon first arriving here, your sight is blinded from the intense natural
light from the sun above!  After a minute or two of your eyes taking in the
adjustment, you notice two very interesting things.  Up above you can make
out a small floating sign, and in front of you, to the north, is a large
door glowing with a {$Blue {&Aura{0.

24058.name: On the Bridge
description: CREEEEKK!  This bridge is extremely old and worn down.  With every step
you take, the wood cries out from the pressure and the whole bridge wiggles
and wabbles.  You can pretty much figure that it's not the safest place to
be ;)

24182.name: Entrance to the {3Realm {$of {8Earth{0
description: You stand before the entrance to the Realm of Earth.  A feeling of
intense power surrounds you and your body feels closer to earth, more than
it has ever before.  A great boulder like door, blocks you passage onward..
If you only had the key...

24059.name: On the Middle of the Bridge
description: You are walking on the bridge, directly over the center of the pool of
lava.  The lava seems to be extremely violent here and some of it is
actually sputtering up onto the bridge!

24071.name: Ore Cart Nexus
description: As you squeeze through the small hole from back south you notice a huge
open area.  A crisscross of lines brings together many mining rails here.
Many of them have old broken down ore carts upon them, while the rails look
a bit rusty.  Shovels and picks litter the floors here as if a bunch of old
dwarves just abandoned the area with immediate haste.  You hear a loud
scream echo throughout the nexus....  You cant seem to place the direction
of it.
To the west is an ore cart lined on the tracks. The rail dips almost straight down. To the north and east are rails tracks as well, both leading into darkness.

24099.name: Upwelling Magma
description: Bright red-orange light reveals a lake of burning magma.  From here on in
you will have to make leaps on the pieces of rock here and there jutting out
from the magma if you wish to continue.

24209.name: In the Air

24050.name: Behind the Waterfall
description: You manage to get by the waterfall, just a tad wet, and now stand in a
beautiful cavern glittering and shining from clear quartz crystal embedded
into the walls.  From behind you, the waterfall roars and fills the cavern
with an echoing sound.

24093.name: Upwelling Magma
description: Bright red-orange light reveals a lake of burning magma.  From here on in

To the north a glittering light can be seen flickering off the walls, animating shadows  that aren't really there.

the trickling water collects.

24102.name: Approaching a Cliffside
description: The stream flows on east to some huge sized boulders that ends the
surrounding cave to a cliff.  You creep up to the boulders and take a look
down below to see that the magma pours straight down from here in the form
of a great waterfall!  Below, te magma gathers in a small pool and slowly
trickles on further east and out of your view.  Also, as you look, something
below catches your eye....  It seemed to have ran toward the magma waterfall
and is now out of your sight.
Down leads along a steep and rocky path which leads to the pool of magma below

24024.name: Tne Doors of The Elements
description: You are in a very tight room, a the Blue door is drectly behind you, and
right before your nose now lies a {1red{0 door casting its own {&aura{0 as

24001.name: A Scaley Fire Drake~
description:
You find yourself staring right into the lava-like eyes of Fire Drake. 
He pulls his long slender body out of a pool of lava which looks better
equiped for swimming than walking.  His stumpy legs slip now and then starts
to rush towards you.  With the sound of grinding boulders you see flakes of
lava crumble off him as he snakes his way towards you.  His dragon like face
contorts with rage while mouth opens and you are blinded by a fireball!

Standing over eight feet tall this creature is truely a sight to behold. 
His huge muscles are bulging underneath his think scaly hide.  His black
scales are offset only by his yellowish underbelly.  His large mantables
open and close as he looks at you with an unserving gaze through his narrow
eyes.  At the end of his long arms are great claws that the creature starts
to raise towards you!

Before you sits a huge dragon like you have never seen before.  His
massive body towers over you and his long neck and head turns to meet your

back and wings seem to burn and flicker like flames.  His tail swings back
and forth slowly and his sky blue eyes narrow.  He sits on his back legs and
leans on his front forearm, with the other he scratches his chin before
deciding that you are not welcome here and attacks!

24247.name: The elemental golem~
description:
This golem seems to shift form between the elements.  Shifting from Fire
to ice and then to stone and mist.  It never stays in one form but is 
constantly shifting.  It's orb shaped eyes gleam with intelligence as
it scans the room looking for intruders.
